name: FUNGUN - bullet hell game jam submission
name_original: FUNGUN - bullet hell game jam submission
description:
this game was made in 7 days for the bullet hell game jam. the theme was 10 seconds

interested in game dev? check out the r/Soldevelopment discord

my games

I streamed most of the dev process on reddit

controls:

WASD - movement

MOUSE - aim

CLICK - shoot

ESC - quit 

Gameplay:

the game is arcade-like

kill all the enemies to proceed to the next level

you'll get 10 bullets every 10 seconds

find rare mushrooms to increase your rate of fire
